name: R4B-EvidenceVariable-R5-EvidenceVariable
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B EvidenceVariable into FHIR R5

element.display: A definition of an exposure, outcome, or other variable

target.display: A definition of an exposure, outcome, or other variable
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.actual` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.actual`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.author` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.author`

element.display: A grouping for ordinal or polychotomous variables

target.display: A grouping for ordinal or polychotomous variables
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.category`

R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.name`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.category.value[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.category.value[x]`

element.display: What defines the members of the evidence element

target.display: A defining factor of the EvidenceVariable
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic`

element.display: What code or expression defines members?
Natural language description of the characteristic

target.display: Natural language description of the characteristic
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.description` - description has change due to type change: R4B description string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 description

element.display: Whether the characteristic includes or excludes members

target.display: Whether the characteristic is an inclusion criterion or exclusion criterion
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.exclude` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.exclude`

R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: mean | median | mean-of-mean | mean-of-median | median-of-mean | median-of-median

target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Used for footnotes or explanatory notes
Used to express the observation at a defined amount of time after the study start
Used to express the observation within a period after the study start

target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.contact` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.contact`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.contained`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.date` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.date`

element.display: Natural language description of the evidence variable

target.display: Natural language description of the evidence variable
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.description` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.description`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.editor` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.editor`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.endorser` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.endorser`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `EvidenceVariable.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

R4B `EvidenceVariable.handling` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.handling` - handling has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/variable-handling|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/variable-handling|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `EvidenceVariable.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.id`

element.display: Additional identifier for the evidence variable

target.display: Additional identifier for the evidence variable
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.implicitRules`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `EvidenceVariable.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `EvidenceVariable.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.meta`

R4B `EvidenceVariable.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `EvidenceVariable.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name for this evidence variable (computer friendly)

target.display: Name for this evidence variable (computer friendly)
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.name`

element.display: Used for footnotes or explanatory notes

target.display: Used for footnotes or explanatory notes
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `EvidenceVariable.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)

target.display: Name of the publisher/steward (organization or individual)
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.publisher` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.publisher`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.relatedArtifact` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.relatedArtifact`
R4B `EvidenceVariable.reviewer` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.reviewer`

element.display: Title for use in informal contexts

target.display: Title for use in informal contexts
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.shortTitle` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.shortTitle`

R4B `EvidenceVariable.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.text`

element.display: Name for this evidence variable (human friendly)

target.display: Name for this evidence variable (human friendly)
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.title` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.title`

element.display: Canonical identifier for this evidence variable, represented as a URI (globally unique)

target.display: Canonical identifier for this evidence variable, represented as a URI (globally unique)
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.url` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.url`

element.display: The context that the content is intended to support

target.display: The context that the content is intended to support
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.useContext` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.useContext`

element.display: Business version of the evidence variable

target.display: Business version of the evidence variable
target.comment: R4B `EvidenceVariable.version` maps as Equivalent to R5 `EvidenceVariable.version`
